title: UNIVERSITY OF BENIN TEACHING HOSPITAL MANAGEMENT BOARD ACT
title_en: UNIVERSITY OF BENIN TEACHING HOSPITAL MANAGEMENT BOARD ACT

provisions.title: Establishment of the Teaching Hospital and Management Board
provisions.content: Establishment of the Teaching Hospital and Management Board (1) There is hereby established a teaching hospital by the name of the University of Benin Teaching Hospital for the purpose of providing such facilities for the training of medical and other students as are usually provided by teaching hospitals of internationally high repute. (2) There shall be established for the management of the hospital a body to be known as the University of Benin Teaching Hospital Management Board (in this Act referred to as "the Board") which shall be a body corporate with perpetual succession and a common seal.

provisions.title: Composition, functions etc., of the Board
provisions.content: Composition, functions etc., of the Board The composition, functions and powers of the Board established under subsection (2) of section 1 shall be as provided for in the University Teaching Hospitals (Reconstitution of Boards, etc.) Act. [Cap. UI5.]

provisions.title: Short title
provisions.content: 3. Short title This Act may be cited as the University of Benin Teaching Hospital Management Board Act. SUBSIDIARY LEGISLATION No Subsidiary Legislation
